properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Our goal the holy city with the Lord It is our portion 'tis where He's adored Although our bodies still are living here Our spirits with our glorious Lord are there Our spirits with our glorious Lord are there{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Our goal divine the new Jerusalem That holy city made for God with men For all redeemed who have Thy pathway trod Shall have the right to share the bliss with God Shall have the right to share the bliss with God{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And every time we toward that city gaze Then every time we long to see Thy face We long to hear the shout that calls to Thee With Thee to share Thy God eternally With Thee to share Thy God eternally{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Our heart's desire is not the peace so sweet Our longed for hope is not the joy we'll meet But Thou Thyself Thou art "our hope" O Lord For 'tis Thyself that will be our reward For 'tis Thyself that will be our reward{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Jesus Lord we pray Thee hear our cry Come bring us to that city from on high That in that glory we may share with Thee Thy loving Self partake eternally Thy loving Self partake eternally{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}O Lord Thou sayest "I make all things new" New heav'ns new earth and all within them Our God Himself our portion then shall be O Lord come quickly take us up with Thee O Lord come quickly take us up with Thee{/lang-eng}
